patient_info: Proteinuria,Glomerulonephritis,Renal cyst,Hearing impairment,Hematuria,Thrombocytosis,Leukocytosis,Hypoalbuminemia,Hypercholesterolemia,Poor appetite,Abnormal prostate morphology,Chronic kidney disease
golden_diagnosis: Alport syndrome, X-linked,Alport syndrome 2, autosomal recessive,Alport syndrome 3, autosomal dominant,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Alport syndrome, X-linked
2. Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease
3. Allelic heterogeneity (Multiple renal and systemic disorders caused by mutations in the same gene)
4. Polygenic disorders (Disorders caused by mutations in multiple genes)
5. Congenital adrenal hyperplasia, salt-losing
6. Membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis (Glomerulonephritis with thickening of the glomerular basement membrane)
7. Goodpasture's disease
8. Multiple myeloma
9. Hemolytic uremic syndrome
10. Thrombotic microangiopathy
